item.title: Combat related - New project
item.dc:creator: @curry_muncha curry muncha
item.description:
@curry_muncha wrote:

I have been working on this new project, and i’m making it from pimpscape, I changed the max level to 99,

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
    		return lvl;
		}
		}
		return 99;

}[/code]

Thing that changing the 135, to 99, would change the combat to 126, it didn’t the combat now is 185 :s
Please help me

thanks Curry muncha

Read full topic
